p: The results dealing with the antifungal activity cannot be compared with other published data, because the effectiveness of this EO has never been checked against molds. However previous studies showed a poor activity of Citrus limon against the zoophilic dermatophyte M. canis [ 21]. Furthermore some Citrus spp yielded MIC values ranging from 2.5% to more than 5% against A. fumigatus [ 22].
